result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Demond L Seay

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Demond L Seay in court.  Attorney Luis Javier Irizarry Lugo in court for Demond L Seay.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for final pre-trial. Defense informs the Court a motion to withdraw has been filed. Discussion held. Court GRANTS defense's motion to withdraw. Court orders matter set for a status of counsel. Court vacates trial date.  Case remains calendared in Br 15.
Status conference scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Requested Jury Instructions, received and filed.
Received and filed. Justice Point Supervision Report. Deputy Court Clerk: EAB.

Defendant Demond L Seay appeared by video.  Attorney Luis Javier Irizarry Lugo appeared by video for Demond L Seay.  Attorney Foley Van Lieshout in court for State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held off the record due to no court reporter availability. Defendant wishes to enter a speedy trial demand. Court accepts. Case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial. Case adjourned, Branch 15.
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Demond L Seay appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Travis Schwantes appeared by video for Demond L Seay.  Attorney Navjot Singh Hira appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge J.D. Watts, Branch 15.   Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned to Branch 15 for pretrial conference.  This hearing MAY be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/104d9737-ba2f-8811-9083-aed2135824d9
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with Jeffrey M.D.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
